content: जंभः [जभ्-अच्-नुम्] {@--1@} The jaws (usually in <ab>pl.</ab>). {@--2@} A tooth. {@--3@} Eating. {@--4@} Biting asunder. {@--5@} A part, portion. {@--6@} A quiver. {@--7@} The chin. {@--8@} Yawning, gaping. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon killed by Indra. {@--10@} One who devours a demon. {@--11@} Explanation, interpretation. {@--12@} The citron tree.
